text: Allah apeleeche chilandanyo chawandu makafili pa wankwao Nuhu ni wankwao Lutwi, wanawawiliwa waliji pasi pa achikapolo wawili mwa achikapolo Wetu wambone, nambo waatesile chinyengo (achiwammakwaowo pakusisa ukafili mu ntima ni kamulana ni amagongo), basi (Achimitumeo) nganiwakamuchisya (achiwammakwaowo) chilichose mu (ipotesi) yakuumila kwa Allah, ni yawechetedwe (yanti): “Jinjilani ku Moto pamo ni akwinjila.”
